Easy.title: RPG: Health Potion
Easy.description: Your hero is hurt! Calculating healing logic. The potion restores exactly 20 health points to the current HP.

roles.architect: Logic Task: We need to increase a numeric value. Take the current health and add 20 to it.
roles.translator: Syntax Task: Use the '+' operator to add 20 to 'current_hp'. Assign the result to 'new_hp'.
roles.debugger: Check: Ensure they are adding integers, not strings (e.g. '20').

Easy.title: FPS: Reload Mechanic
Easy.description: The player pressed 'R'. We need to reset the ammo counter back to the magazine capacity (30 rounds).

roles.architect: Logic Task: We need to reset a value. Ignore the current ammo count and overwrite it directly with the maximum capacity.
roles.translator: Syntax Task: Assign the integer value 30 to the variable 'ammo' using the '=' operator.
roles.debugger: Check: Did they try to add 30? We want to SET it to 30, not add to it.

Easy.title: Racing: Nitro Boost
Easy.description: Nitro activated! The car's speed should instantly double.

roles.architect: Logic Task: We need to scale a value. Take the current speed and multiply it by 2.
roles.translator: Syntax Task: Use the '*' operator to multiply 'speed' by 2.
roles.debugger: Check: Ensure they assign the result back to 'speed' (speed = ...).

Easy.title: Social: Username Formatter
Easy.description: A new user signed up with messy casing 'xX_Slayer_Xx'. Convert their username to all lowercase for the database.

roles.architect: Logic Task: Text Normalization. Convert every character in the string to its lowercase equivalent.
roles.translator: Syntax Task: Use the string method .lower(). Remember the parentheses ().

Easy.title: Puzzle: Score Multiplier
Easy.description: Combo achieved! Calculate the total score by adding the base points and the bonus points together.

roles.architect: Logic Task: Simple Arithmetic. Sum two variables together.
roles.translator: Syntax Task: Use '+' between the variable names.
roles.debugger: Check: Variable names must match exactly.

Easy.title: Inventory: The First Slot
Easy.description: The player wants to equip the primary weapon. Retrieve the FIRST item from the 'backpack' list.

roles.architect: Logic Task: List Access. Get the item at the very beginning of the collection.
roles.translator: Syntax Task: Use square brackets []. The index for the first item is 0.
roles.debugger: Check: Did they use 1? It must be 0.

Easy.title: Chat: Shout Filter
Easy.description: A player is spamming caps. Convert their message to Title Case (Capitalize first letter only) to calm them down.

roles.architect: Logic Task: Text Transformation. Make the first letter big, rest small.
roles.translator: Syntax Task: Use the .capitalize() method.

Easy.title: Economy: Gold Loot
Easy.description: We defeated a goblin. Create a list containing the loot: 'Gold Coin' and 'Dagger'.

roles.architect: Logic Task: Create a Collection. It needs two specific text items.
roles.translator: Syntax Task: Use square brackets []. Strings need quotes. Comma to separate.

Easy.title: Stats: Level Up Cost
Easy.description: Calculate XP needed for next level. Formula: Current Level times 100.

roles.architect: Logic Task: Multiplication. Scale the level by a factor of 100.
roles.translator: Syntax Task: Use '*'.

Easy.title: Physics: Gravity Fall
Easy.description: The player is falling. Update the Y-position by subtracting the 'fall_speed'.

roles.architect: Logic Task: Decrement a value. Position goes down, so subtract speed.
roles.translator: Syntax Task: Use '-' operator.

Easy.title: UI: Welcome Message
Easy.description: Combine the strings 'Welcome, ' and the 'player_name' to greet the user.

roles.architect: Logic Task: Concatenation. Join two text strings together.
roles.translator: Syntax Task: Use '+' between the string literal and the variable.
roles.debugger: Check: Quotes on 'Welcome, ' but NOT on player_name.

Easy.title: Combat: Shield Break
Easy.description: The shield has been depleted. Set 'shield_active' to False.

roles.architect: Logic Task: Boolean Assignment. Turn the switch OFF.
roles.translator: Syntax Task: Assign the boolean value False (Capital F).
roles.debugger: Check: Python booleans are capitalized (False, not false).

Easy.title: Shop: Buy Item
Easy.description: Player bought a potion. Subtract 'price' from 'gold'.

roles.architect: Logic Task: Subtraction. Reduce the total gold.
roles.translator: Syntax Task: use '-' operator.
roles.debugger: Check: gold - price (correct) vs price - gold (wrong).

Easy.title: Party: Add Member
Easy.description: A new hero wants to join! Add 'Rogue' to the 'party' list.

roles.architect: Logic Task: List Modification. Add a new item to the end of the collection.
roles.translator: Syntax Task: Use the .append() method on the list.

Easy.title: Settings: Volume Up

roles.architect: Logic Task: Increment. Add 1 to the value.
roles.translator: Syntax Task: + 1

Medium.title: Platformer: Double Jump
Medium.description: Allow the player to jump ONLY IF their 'jump_count' is less than 2.

roles.architect: Logic Task: Conditional Action. Check a numeric limit. If below limit, perform action.
roles.translator: Syntax Task: Use 'if' and the '<' operator.

Medium.title: RPG: Critical Hit
Medium.description: If the dice roll is greater than 90, multiply damage by 3. Else, keep normal damage.

roles.architect: Logic Task: Conditional Modification. If a high roll happens, scale the value drastically.
roles.translator: Syntax Task: 'if roll > 90:'. Indent the math.

Medium.title: Loot: Rare Drop
Medium.description: We opened a chest. If the item is 'Legendary', play the 'fanfare' sound. Otherwise, play 'click'.

roles.architect: Logic Task: Binary Branch. Specific action for one type, default action for others.
roles.translator: Syntax Task: if/else block. Use '==' for string comparison.

Medium.title: Survival: Hunger Check
Medium.description: If hunger is greater than 80 OR health is less than 20, flash the warning screen.

roles.architect: Logic Task: Compound Logic (OR). If any one of these bad things is true, trigger the alarm.
roles.translator: Syntax Task: Use 'or' between the comparisons.

Medium.title: Crafting: Make Sword
Medium.description: To craft a sword, you need 2 Iron AND 1 Wood. Check if you have enough resources.

roles.architect: Logic Task: Compound Logic (AND). Both requirements must be met.
roles.translator: Syntax Task: Use 'and'. Use '>=' (greater or equal).

Medium.title: Inventory: Backpack Limit
Medium.description: Check if the inventory is full. If the length of 'items' is greater than or equal to 'max_slots', show 'Full' message.

roles.architect: Logic Task: Capacity Check. Compare the size of the collection to a limit variable.
roles.translator: Syntax Task: Use len() for size. Use '>='.

Medium.title: Social: Ban Hammer
Medium.description: If the user's 'report_count' is over 10, set 'is_banned' to True.

roles.architect: Logic Task: Threshold Trigger. If a number exceeds X, flip a flag.
roles.translator: Syntax Task: if statement. Assign True.

Medium.starter_code:
def moderation_bot(report_count):
    is_banned = False
    # Check reports
    return is_banned

Medium.title: FPS: Auto-Reload
Medium.description: If ammo is exactly 0, call reload(). Else if (elif) ammo is less than 5, show 'Low Ammo' warning.

roles.architect: Logic Task: Multi-stage check. Priority 1: Empty? Priority 2: Low?
roles.translator: Syntax Task: if / elif structure.

Medium.title: Race: Lap Counter
Medium.description: The player crossed the line. Increment 'laps'. If 'laps' is now 3, trigger 'finish_race()'.

roles.architect: Logic Task: Sequential Logic. First add to the counter, THEN check if the limit is reached.
roles.translator: Syntax Task: Increment first. Then use 'if' check.

Medium.title: Cards: Deck Builder
Medium.description: We need to remove a card. If 'Ace' is in the 'hand' list, remove it using .remove().

roles.architect: Logic Task: Membership Check. Verify if an item exists in the collection before trying to delete it.
roles.translator: Syntax Task: 'if value in list:'. Then use list.remove(value).

Medium.title: Login: Password Reset
Medium.description: If 'email' is in 'database', send reset link. Else, print 'User not found'.

roles.architect: Logic Task: Lookup logic. Check existence in a dataset.
roles.translator: Syntax Task: 'if x in y'. else print.

Medium.title: Puzzle: Sequence
Medium.description: Slice the 'secret_code' to get the last 3 characters.

roles.architect: Logic Task: Negative Slicing. Get a portion of text relative to the END of the string.
roles.translator: Syntax Task: Use [-3:]. The negative index counts from the right.

Medium.title: Shop: Discount
Medium.description: Apply a 10% discount. Price equals price multiplied by 0.9.

roles.architect: Logic Task: Float Math. Reduce value to 90% of original.
roles.translator: Syntax Task: Multiply by 0.9.

Medium.title: Music: Playlist Loop
Medium.description: We are at the end of the playlist. Set 'current_track_index' back to 0.

roles.architect: Logic Task: Reset. Set the index tracker to the start position.
roles.translator: Syntax Task: Assign 0.

Medium.title: Settings: Dark Mode
Medium.description: If 'theme' is 'Light', set it to 'Dark'. Else set it to 'Light'.

roles.architect: Logic Task: Toggle State based on current value.
roles.translator: Syntax Task: if/else assignment.

Hard.title: Turn-Based: Damage All
Hard.description: The wizard cast Fireball! Iterate through the 'enemies' list and apply 50 damage to each 'enemy'.

roles.architect: Logic Task: Batch Processing. Perform the same function on every single item in the collection.
roles.translator: Syntax Task: 'for loop'. Call the method on the loop variable.
roles.debugger: Check: Did they loop 'enemies' but use 'enemy' inside?

Hard.title: Data: High Score
Hard.description: Find the best player. Iterate through 'scores' list. If a score is higher than 'max_score', update 'max_score'.

roles.architect: Logic Task: Finding a Maxiumum. Scan everything, keep track of the highest value seen so far.
roles.translator: Syntax Task: Loop, then 'if' check inside. Assign loop var to tracker.

Hard.starter_code:
def find_winner(scores):
    max_score = 0
    # Scan scores
    return max_score

Hard.title: Grid: Map Movement
Hard.description: We are moving on a 2D grid. We have a list of rows. We need to print every tile in the map to render it.

roles.architect: Logic Task: Nested Iteration. Loop through the rows, then loop through the items inside each row.
roles.translator: Syntax Task: Double 'for' loop. One inside the other.

Hard.title: AI: Pathfinding
Hard.description: The enemy is chasing you. While the distance to player is greater than 1, call 'move_forward()'.

roles.architect: Logic Task: Conditional Loop. Keep doing it UNTIL the goal is met (distance is small).
roles.translator: Syntax Task: 'while' loop.

Hard.title: System: Save Game
Hard.description: Try to write to the save file. If it fails (PermissionError), print 'Save Failed'.

roles.architect: Logic Task: Exception Handling. Plan for a crash.
roles.translator: Syntax Task: try/except block.

Hard.title: Inventory: Filter Junk
Hard.description: Create a new list 'valuable_items'. Copy items from 'inventory' ONLY if their value is > 10.

roles.architect: Logic Task: Filtering. Iterate source, check criteria, add to destination.
roles.translator: Syntax Task: Loop, If, Append.
roles.debugger: Check: Appending to the NEW list, not the old one.

Hard.starter_code:
def sort_valuables(inventory):
    valuable_items = []
    # Filter logic
    return valuable_items

Hard.title: Combat: Combo Breaker
Hard.description: Count down from 5 to 1. If the player gets hit (player_hit is True) inside the loop, 'break' the combo immediately.

roles.architect: Logic Task: Loop with Early Exit. Counting down, but stopping prematurely if an event occurs.
roles.translator: Syntax Task: range(5, 0, -1). 'break' keyword inside 'if'.

Hard.title: RPG: Stat Sheet
Hard.description: We have a dictionary of stats (Str: 10, Dex: 5). Loop through it and print 'Stat: Value' for each entry.
Hard.correct_syntax:
for stat, val in stats.items():
    print(stat, val)

roles.architect: Logic Task: Dictionary Iteration (Key-Value). We need access to both labels and numbers.
roles.translator: Syntax Task: use .items() method in the for loop.
roles.debugger: Check: unpacking two variables in the loop definition.

Hard.title: Puzzle: Find Key
Hard.description: Search the 'room_items' list. If you find 'Gold Key', set 'found' to True and STOP searching (break).

roles.architect: Logic Task: Search & Stop. Linear scan. Once goal is met, stop wasting resources.
roles.translator: Syntax Task: Loop, if check, break.

Hard.starter_code:
def search_room(room_items):
    found = False
    # Search logic
    return found

Hard.title: Boss: Rage Mode
Hard.description: The boss health is regenerating! While health < 1000, add 10 to health. But if it hits 1000, print 'Fully Healed'.

roles.architect: Logic Task: While Loop logic. Increment value until cap is reached. Then perform final action.
roles.translator: Syntax Task: While loop. Print statement OUTSIDE the loop.

Hard.title: Chat: Bot Reply
Hard.description: Analyze message. If 'help' in message, reply 'Support'. Elif 'price' in message, reply 'Cost'. Else reply 'Unknown'.

roles.architect: Logic Task: Keyword Detection (Branching). Check for substrings to determine response.
roles.translator: Syntax Task: if/elif/else chain with 'in' operator.

Hard.title: Match-3: Swap
Hard.description: Swap two gems in a list. We need to use a temporary variable to hold gem_a while we overwrite it.
Hard.correct_syntax:
temp = gem_a
gem_a = gem_b
gem_b = temp

roles.architect: Logic Task: Variable Swap. The classic 'Three-Cup' shuffle logic to avoid losing data.
roles.translator: Syntax Task: Assign to temp, overwrite first, overwrite second with temp.

Hard.title: Race: Leaderboard
Hard.description: We have a list of 'times'. Sort them in ascending order (fastest first) to rank players.

roles.architect: Logic Task: Sorting. Ordering a collection by value.
roles.translator: Syntax Task: .sort() method.

Hard.title: Server: User Queue
Hard.description: Users are waiting. Remove the FIRST user from the 'queue' list to let them in (FIFO).

roles.architect: Logic Task: Dequeue. Remove from the FRONT of the line.
roles.translator: Syntax Task: .pop(0). Index 0 is critical.

Hard.title: Physics: Collision 1D
Hard.description: Check collision. If player_x is greater than enemy_x - 10 AND player_x is less than enemy_x + 10.
Hard.correct_syntax:
if player_x > enemy_x - 10 and player_x < enemy_x + 10:
    collide()

roles.architect: Logic Task: Range Check. Is the point inside the bounding box (start, end)?
roles.translator: Syntax Task: Compound 'if' with 'and'. Math in comparison.
roles.debugger: Check: Greater than min, Less than max.
